abstract: marwood surveyors win prestigious midlands enterprise award .
article: marwood surveyors are passionate about property and always go the extra mile to provide excellent customer caresme news magazine has announced that sutton coldfield-based marwood surveyors has won the prestigious ` property surveyors of the year 2017 & excellence award for property valuations ' award from the midlands enterprise awards . the midlands region throughout the years has been an innovator in all forms of business , trade and industry . as such , the midlands enterprise awards 2017 set out to highlight individuals and firms within the region , and celebrate their innovation , customer satisfaction and performance .

dreamy bedroom decor ideas for 2018jordan japal , the midlands enterprise awards coordinator , said : `` it has been huge honour and privilege to work with every one of the deserving winners from across this dynamic region , and i am very proud of the success they have achieved . `` i would like to congratulate marwood surveyors on their success and wish them the best of luck going forward . '' according to sme news , their team pride themselves on the validity of its awards and winners . the awards are given solely on merit and are awarded to commend those most deserving for their ingenuity and hard work , distinguishing them from their competitors and proving them worthy of recognition .

sophie bullock , director at marwood surveyors , said : `` our promise is to always provide a fresh approach to our industry , constantly working ` outside the box ' and consistently going the extra mile in order to offer our clients ; both vendors and purchasers alike , an exceptional estate agency service . `` we are so delighted to have won this category award , and hope that this is a sign of things to come for our team in 2018 . '' new year 's resolutions you need to make for your home in 2018marwood surveyors are passionate about property and always go the extra mile to provide excellent customer care to all of their valued clients .
as such , the aim is to exceed clients ' expectations by providing expert advice and value for money . to find out more about marwood surveyors , visit www . marwoodsurveyors . com .
